name: Fengyi
description: Fengyi, goddess of winds, rules ober their flow, speed, and direction, especially the gentle and lively ones.

skills.name: Great Rising Gale
skills.description: Fengyi channels all whirlwinds, dealing DMG equal to 280% of ATK to targets in a large area and consuming all her whirlwinds. Each whirlwind deals 15% of ATK as extra DMG.

upgrades.level2: Each whirlwind deals 30% of ATK as extra DMG.
upgrades.level4: Restores 30 Energy for each whirlwind she has when casting a skill.

skills.name: Billowing Sleeves
skills.description: Fengyi swings her sleeves, firing a tornado at the nearest target and dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies in a straight line.

upgrades.level3: Reduces the M-RES of hit units by 20%.
upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 250%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Slumbering Breeze
skills.description: Fengyi gains 2 whirlwinds upon entering battle. Each whirlwind grants Fengyi 15% ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases every whirlwind's ATK bonus to 20%.
upgrades.level3: Fengyi gains 3 whirlwinds upon entering battle.
upgrades.level4: Increases every whirlwind's ATK bonus to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Drifting Petals
skills.description: The first time an enemy Deity's HP drops below 80%, Fengyi deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK to that Deity and gains a whirlwind. Fengyi can have a maximum of 4 whirlwinds at once.

relic.name: Vortex of Grace
relic.description: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 1 whirlwind.

upgrades.level2: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 2 whirlwinds.
upgrades.level3: Restores 50 Energy when Fengyi gains a whirlwind. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 3 whirlwinds. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
